objects.specification: A broad rectangular floor surface extending across the room, with a light neutral tone resembling polished hardwood or vinyl tile, featuring subtle texture that suggests gentle sheen and slight grain, clean and uniform.
A tall vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface, painted in a soft pastel blue hue with a subtle stucco texture, crisp edges and modern finish.
A tall vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface, painted in a soft pastel green hue with a light matte finish and faint brush stroke texture for visual interest.
A tall vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface, painted in a soft pastel yellow hue with a gentle rough texture and modern look.
A tall vertical rectangular wall with smooth plaster surface, painted in a soft pastel pink hue with a velvety matte texture for a warm and inviting atmosphere.
A large rectangular window opening with clear transparent glass panes, slender modern white frame, allowing ample natural light with slight reflective quality.
A pair of draped curtains of medium-weight fabric in a warm neutral tone, showing gentle folds and soft texture, extending slightly beyond the window edges.
A large rectangular whiteboard panel with a glossy white writing surface, surrounded by a slim aluminum frame, mounted flush to the wall for clean appearance.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector unit with white plastic casing and ventilation grilles, featuring a central lens on the front and a sleek rectangular form.
A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves in a natural medium wood finish, each shelf filled with neatly arranged books of varying colors and sizes, simple modern design.
A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves in a natural medium wood finish, each shelf filled with neatly arranged books of varying colors and sizes, simple modern design.
A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves in a natural medium wood finish, each shelf filled with neatly arranged books of varying colors and sizes, simple modern design.
A round wall clock with a clean white face, bold black numerals and hands, encased in a slim metal frame with a matte finish.
A rectangular educational poster featuring vivid infographics and charts, laminated surface with bright colors and clear graphics, thin frameless design.
A rectangular educational poster featuring vivid infographics and charts, laminated surface with bright colors and clear graphics, thin frameless design.

A flush-mounted ceiling light fixture with a circular white casing and translucent diffuser, providing soft even illumination.

A large rectangular desk constructed from rich warm wood tone with a smooth polished surface, slightly larger than student desks, featuring sturdy straight legs and simple modern styling.
An ergonomic chair with padded seat and back upholstered in a complementary blue fabric, featuring a supportive curved backrest and sturdy modern frame.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage, displayed in a simple ceramic pot with neutral finish, organic shape and natural texture.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of grey plastic with smooth matte finish, open top design and functional everyday style.

A student chair with a molded seat and back in a vibrant blue color, supported by slender metal legs, ergonomic contours and durable finish.
